Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to own our premium product, valued at $12,000. I understand its worth to you and would like to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $10,800. This is an exceptional deal considering the value it holds for you. Don't miss out on this chance to secure a high-quality item at a competitive price. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
